It works fine in previous build I20060427-1600.

I see this failure in the I20060427-2000 build, but the subsequent I20060428-0010 build works fine, so this appears to have been fixed.

SWT did not change anything related to image loading between I20060427-1600 and I20060427-2000, so the problem was likely introduced by a changed image at the UI level.
